faq_item.name: What is a DApp?
faq_item.content: A decentralized application (DApp) is a computer application that runs on a distributed computing system. DApps have been popularized by distributed ledger technologies (DLT) such as the Ethereum Blockchain, where DApps are often referred to as smart contracts.

faq_item.name: Does the Browser access any type of website?
faq_item.content: Yes, our browser works just like any web browser. You can access DApps, CoinMarketCap, as well as Google, Facebook, or any other website on the network.

faq_item.name: Are the DApps accessed through the wallet from Klever?
faq_item.content: No. The wallet only makes the transparent connection between the DApps and your account, but we are not the owners and we are not responsible for any transaction carried out through the wallet with the browser DApps. Always do your research.
